name: Remote Data Backups
tag_list: online-backup, data-backup, remote-backup, computer-backup, back-up-files, backup-partner-program, business-backup, file-backup
overview:
Decade of business-class backup protecting critical business data.

  • Free 30-day Backup Trial, No Credit Card Required
  • Fast, secure transfers and ultra-reliable restores
  • World-class, mirrored underground data centers
  • Redundant, dedicated fiber-optic bandwidth
  • Industry’s leading Backup Reseller Program

LIVE Server Backup features best-in-class continuous backup for rapid, point-in-time restore, with integrated SQL & Exchange support.

  • Unparalleled data security & world-class reliability
  • Continuous backup for rapid, point-in-time restores
  • Integrated open SQL, Exchange & Sharepoint support
  • Centralized data management via secure web portal

Free Online Backup Partner Program Turnkey affiliate-reseller program from established, business-class Remote Backup Provider in Fort Collins. Check it out at a.RDBU.com or call us 24/7 at 866-722-2587.

Essential service for small to medium business; great source of recurring income. Great foot-in-the-door opportunity to get new clients and more billable hours.

  • Free branded backup partner site
  • Free branded marketing tools (email messages, banner ads, brochures, etc)
  • Free control panel to manage backup accounts
  • Free 30-day backup trial (no credit card required)
  • Free 24/7 phone support
  • Free remote support available
